name: Fight I.O
description:
Fight IO is a very simple MORPG inspired of Cybercode, Pokemon, etc. The match are one to one with another player online.

This game is in development. Test the game with your friends and if you have any question or comment please let me know!

Warning: If you cannot find an opponent is because there are no other players looking for a match. Then, invite your friends ;)

Technologies

  • Interface
    • HTML, CSS, Javascript
  • Server
    • NodeJS, ExpressJS, Socket.IO

Changelog

  •  v.0.1.6 => Upgrade player interface
  •  v.0.1.4 => Add match room  management
  •  v.0.1.0 => A minimal playable version with a quickly match functionnality
